creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of three young women seated on a striped couch with a plant in front of a window in background; woman at center has her hands on her stomach
inscription: on back in pencil: For \"Woman by Three\" book
markings: on back on sticker: Mrs. Joanne Leonard Beasley / 622 Lewis Street / Oakland, California 94607 | on back stamped in black: PHOTOGRAPHS BY JOANNE LEONARD
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Reunion of Lifelong Friends
